snippet: The Gannett-owned newspaper will look more like a Web site and its new Web site will read more like an iPad.
abstract: USA Today redesigns and modernizes its newspaper to look more like a Web site, and its Web site to read more like an iPad; broad makeover is part of an effort by parent company Gannett to combine the resources of all its television and newspaper assets to reinvigorate the brand.
lead_paragraph: The Gannett-owned newspaper will look more like a Web site and its new Web site will read more like an iPad.

headline.seo: USA Today to Introduce a Sleeker Look on Friday
headline.main: Taking Pointers From Web Sites, USA Today Modernizes Its Look
headline.print_headline: Taking Pointers From Web Sites, USA Today Modernizes Its Look
